entry.title: php获取月初和月尾时间
entry.content:
获取当前时间的月初月尾

    echo date("Y-m-01", time());
    echo PHP_EOL;
    echo date('Y-m-t', time());

    // 输出
    2017-09-01
    2017-09-30

获取上一月的月初月尾

    echo date("Y-m-01", strtotime('-1 month'));
    echo PHP_EOL;
    echo date('Y-m-t', strtotime('-1 month'));

    // 输出
    2017-08-01
    2017-08-31

获取下一月的月初月尾

    echo date("Y-m-01", strtotime('+1 month'));
    echo PHP_EOL;
    echo date('Y-m-t', strtotime('+1 month'));

    // 输出
    2017-10-01
    2017-10-31
